name: Tax Engine
description: Tax document parsing (15 forms: 1040, Schedules A-E/SE, 8949, 6251, W-2, 1099-B/DIV/INT, K-1, state returns), liability estimation, tax-loss harvesting, wash sale detection, lot selection, quarterly estimates, Schedule D computation, state tax brackets (8 states), and AMT calculation

defaultFilingStatus.description: Default federal filing status for tax calculations

defaultState.description: Two-letter state code for state tax calculations (e.g. CA, NY)

defaultTaxYear.description: Default tax year when not specified in tool calls
